page.title: 08COMMUNICATIONS-ST.MARTINS
page.content:
There are a few main roads and many lanes in the area. Every day (except Sunday) there is a {postal}delivery.
Mail from outside areas for St.Martins is sorted at Oswestry and for Dudleston sorting takes place at Ellesmere.There are two collections on week days (in the morning and afternoons), a morning collection on Saturdays and none on a Sunday.There are{six post boxes}in the area of which three are in St.Martins.It costs {17p}to post a{first class}letter and {13p}for a{second class.
There are{two telephone boxes}- one is in St.Martins and one in Dudleston.It costs{10p}to make a telephone call.About 80% of all homes have a {telephone.
